metadata.title: CVE-2024-22029 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Insecure permissions in the packaging of tomcat allow local users that wina race during package installation to escalate to root

criterions.comment: tomcat7 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
tomcat8 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
tomcat9 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
